Description: Product Information From the creators of legendary guitars played by some of rock's greatest artists comes the Jackson USA Select SL2H Soloist electric guitar. Designed for maximum sustain and a tone that is distinctly rock, this outstanding guitar is available in over 20 different colors. The SL2H features a neck-through-body design, a feature that induces plenty of sustain. In addition, the guitar's lightweight body adds to this effect. Constructed with high quality components, including Seymour Duncan humbucking pickups and a maple neck, this eye-catching axe is light enough for long gigs. In addition, the guitar's ebony fingerboard is both dependable and comfortable, letting players focus their attention on creating unforgettable music. This guitar is in mint condition with the exception of one small scuff on the face of the guitar which is very hard to see depending on the angle (please see pics). The neck is super fast as you would expect from a guitar of this caliber and the tremolo is insane.
